name: tm17
effect: Teaches Protect to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Protect to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Submission)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
flavor_text.platinum: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
